default.title: Complete your student verification.
default.description: Once you complete student verification, you can enjoy various features of Buddyya.

pending.title: Your student verification is under review.
pending.description: It typically takes about 1 day for the review to be completed, and your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.

studentId.title: Please upload a photo that proves your student status.
studentId.description: The photo must clearly show information that verifies your student status at your school, and it will be deleted immediately after review.

permission.gallery: Gallery access is required to select an image.

email.title: Please enter your school email address for verification.
email.description: We have sent a verification code to your email!
email.label: School Email
email.footer: Your email will be used only for verification.
email.warning: Please enter a valid email address.

verification.title: Please enter the verification code.
verification.titleDescription: A verification code has been sent to {{email}}.
verification.label: Verification Code
verification.checkSpam: Please also check your spam folder.

verificationComplete.title: Student verification is complete.
verificationComplete.description:
Your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.
Start enjoying campus life with Buddyya.

studentIdComplete.title: Student verification request completed.
studentIdComplete.description: It typically takes about 1 day to complete the review, and your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.
